main_definition: Lessened or decreased in size, amount, degree, or importance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Decrease in the price of a product or item
meanings_and_examples.example: The store offered a 50% reduction on all items during the clearance sale.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make something simpler by removing parts or complexities
meanings_and_examples.example: The chef reduced the recipe to fewer ingredients without compromising taste.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A process that transforms waste into reusable materials, energy, or other valuable products
meanings_and_examples.example: Recycling facilities reduce plastic bottles into polyester fibers for clothing.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make a smaller version of something (e.g., reducing the size of an image)
meanings_and_examples.example: The graphic designer reduced the resolution of the photograph to fit on a social media post.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Reducing or limiting some aspect of one's diet
meanings_and_examples.example: To reduce calorie intake, she decided to cut down on sugary snacks and drinks.
